title: EU–INC – A new pan-European legal entity
author: tilt
aiHeadline: The EU, because nothing says 'let's get stuff done' like creating another legal entity to discuss creating more legal entities.

title: Anthropic's original take home assignment open sourced
author: myahio
aiHeadline: Anthropic decides to open-source their take-home assignment, because what better way to assess candidates than making them do your homework for free.

title: Show HN: ChartGPU – WebGPU-powered charting library (1M points at 60fps)
author: huntergemmer
aiHeadline: ChartGPU: because 1 million data points at 60fps is what the world needs right now, apparently. (Hint: it's not.)

title: cURL removes bug bounties
author: jnord
aiHeadline: cURL removes bug bounties, proving once again that the best way to secure software is to make it as unappealing as possible to hackers.

title: Tell HN: Bending Spoons laid off almost everybody at Vimeo yesterday
author: Daemon404
aiHeadline: Bending Spoons lays off almost everyone at Vimeo, because nothing says 'we value our employees' like letting them go in a single fell swoop.
